item.description: I am hiking at Myles Standish State Forest at Lot 2 which is located on Upper College Pond Road. You can look online at map of Myles Standish State Forest to get directions. This will be a 4 - 5 mile hike at a moderate to brisk pace. This is an off-leash hike on some really nice trails. I drive a blue Jeep Cherokee and my cell number is: (508) 559-3677

group.name: The South Shore Dog Lovers Pack Walk

item.name: Myles Standish State Forest
